data.title: Haim Saban's Current Home in Beverly Hills since August 1988
data.meta_description: Located in Beverly Hills, CA this celebrity home is Haim Saban's current house since August 1988.
data.text: Haim Saban, the media billionaire who created Power Ranger, acquired three adjoining lots totaling 6-acres. That's unheard of in Beverly Park. He has built quite the compound. There are gardens for days, outdoor kitchens, a giant lap pool, and everything you can imagine.
